title: [This week in Britain. No. 2: Royal Ballet School]
brief_description: Cinemagazine item: The Royal Ballet School in England where students study both ballet and general studies and from where they are eventually selected to join the Royal Ballet Company. Shopws daily routine of both senior and junior school members and even show them enjoying the ultimate privilege of dancing for Royalty as Princess Margaret opens a new school wing. Presented by June Salter.
